title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Quantity Surveying
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Quantity Surveying 

Industry) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (quantity surveying industry) order 2023

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

the conduct of costs and/or valuation analyses relating to 
construction projects, 
the 
preparation of budgets; 

including, but not 

limited 

to, 

the management and supervision of matters relating to costs 
and/or valuation aspects of construction projects; 

the provision of advice and assistance on matters relating to costs 
and/or valuation aspects of construction projects; 

the management and supervision of tendering and procurement 
processes, in so far as such management and supervision relates 
to the costs and/or valuation aspects of construction projects; and 

the provision of advice and assistance on tendering and 
procurement processes, in so far as such provision of advice and 
assistance relates to the costs and/or valuation aspects of 
construction projects.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) (b) (c) (d) (e) conduct cost valuation analysis relating construction project preparation budget including limited management supervision matter relating cost valuation aspect construction project provision advice assistance matter relating cost valuation aspect construction project management supervision tendering procurement process far management supervision relates cost valuation aspect construction project provision advice assistance tendering procurement process far provision advice assistance relates cost valuation aspect construction project

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: In this Order:
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order: 

"construction projects" means projects which wholly or mainly relate to 
construction operations; 

"construction operations" has the meaning assigned to it in section 1 of the 
Construction Contracts Act 2013 (No. 34 of 2013).
text_norm: 3 order construction project mean project wholly mainly relate construction operation construction operation meaning assigned section 1 construction contract act 2013 (no 34 2013)

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [319] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

8 June 2023.

Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the quantity surveying industry in relation to 
which An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its 
functions in the creation of statutory apprenticeships. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [319] 5
